snippet: The Musée du Louvre in Paris this week launched a new fleet of interactive guides using the Nintendo 3DS, the handheld gaming device, and featuring audio commentary about more than 700 sculptures and paintings along with three-dimensional models and...
abstract: The Musée du Louvre in Paris this week launched a new fleet of interactive guides using the Nintendo 3DS, the handheld gaming device, and featuring audio commentary about more than 700 sculptures and paintings along with three-dimensional models and high-definition photographs of several works.

headline.main: Louvre Teams Up With Nintendo for New Guides
headline.print_headline: Nintendo Devices To Help at Louvre
